definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: persist, exert oneself, persevere (Ar. 4aray persist, persevere);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[אֶת־א]] :´[[שׂ]]: Ho 12:4 he persevered with God; 2 ms. [[וְעִם אֲנׇשִׁים]] ´[[שָׂרִיתָ עִם־א]]: Ge 32:29 (J).—Ho 12:5 has Impf. [[וַיׇּ֫שַׂר]] in same meaning, as if from a (non-existent) [[שׂוּר]]; < rd. [[וַיִּ֫שֶׂר]] (apoc. fr. [[וַיִּשְׂרֶה]]).—[[שׂוֹרָה]] Is 28:25 v. supra, p. 965:a.
